name: github
description: GitHub API integration for repository management, issues, PRs, and code search

requiredEnv.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
requiredEnv.description: Personal access token with repo scope

notes: Never commit GITHUB_TOKEN to version control
Use fine-grained personal access tokens when possible
Grant minimum required scopes (repo, read:org, etc.)
Use separate tokens for different environments

examples.usage: Clone, read, and search code in your repositories
Create issues, PRs, manage branches and workflows

troubleshooting.tokenNotSet: Set GITHUB_TOKEN in your environment: export GITHUB_TOKEN=ghp_your_token
troubleshooting.rateLimitExceeded: Wait for rate limit reset or use authenticated requests
troubleshooting.insufficientPermissions: Ensure token has required scopes in GitHub settings
